DOC.brief_summary: study hypothesis 1 . The aim study : How investigator predict control nasal change maxillary LeFort I osteotomy 2 different alar base suture technique ? 2 . Study hypothesis - Null hypothesis : Nasal change affect 2 different alar base suture technique maxillary LeFort I osteotomy - Alternative : Nasal change affect 2 different alar base suture technique maxillary LeFort I osteotomy
DOC.brief_title: The Nasal Changes Affected Different Alar Base Suture Techniques After Maxillary LeFort I Osteotomy
DOC.detailed_description: Background study purpose : Patients receive maxillary LeFort I osteotomy often complain nose become wider nostril show surgery . According literature review , conventional modify alar base cinch technique could control interalar width . However , long term result show technique superior . Therefore , order improve patient ' nasal midfacial esthetic surgery , study evaluate nasal change affect 2 different alar base cinch suture technique could result positive effect .
DOC.criteria: Taiwanese patient receive LeFort I osteotomy CGMH 20112012 No previous craniofacial surgery Patients agree attend study willing sign agreement Patients elder 18 year old growth completion Craniofacial anomaly cleave lip /or palate patient patient without document patient receive combine correct nasolabial shape orthognathic surgery .
DOC.keyword: Alar Base Suture ; Nasolabial Change ; 3D stereogrammetry
